jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly
A man with a disfigured face comes up from behind the woman
A man’s face turns to a skeleton
The man with the crow mask’s face distorts with a loud sound in the background
Some kids throw eggs at the house and they suddenly splatter at the window
A door suddenly slams
An alien creature appears in front of the camera
The alien finds the woman hiding
The clown runs out from the side of the gas station
The clown appears in front of the woman’s car window
The woman turns the driver over to see that it’s a man with a severely disfigured face
The woman raises her head to see the clown right in front of her
The video suddenly zooms in on the clown’s face
Teddy the bear pops up on the edge of the bed
The dollhouse bursts open
A silhouette of a demon appears in the hallway
Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
The room suddenly shakes and the lights cut out
Brandon jumps out at Tori (as a joke)
A figure moves quickly past in the foreground as Tori returns to the house
Brandon suddenly lunges at his mother and makes a barking noise
Caitlyn backs away from the open window and is startled when the bedroom door behind her bursts open
There is the sound of twigs snapping and suddenly Brandon appears right in front of Tori
The light suddenly breaks above the waitress
A figure moves past in the foreground
The door is suddenly pulled away
Brightburn suddenly lunges at the waitress
There is a knock at the door during a tense scene
Brightburn suddenly flies through the truck window
There is a sharp flashback to earlier in the movie as Kyle lies in bed
The baby with red eyes suddenly lunges at the camera just as Kyle wakes up from a dream
There is a loud crash and Tori screams
As the 911 operator answers, Brightburn suddenly smashes through the living room
As Tori says “I’m here I’m here” Brightburn flies past right in front of her
Brightburn suddenly tackles the sheriff as he says “you’re safe now” to Tori
The camera pans back to the deputy and Brightburn is now standing right behind her
Brightburn suddenly flies into the room where Tori is hiding
The bear appears in the foreground in the heavily zoomed shot, with a dramatic music chord
The phone in the foreground rings loudly, and Sari jumps up on the bed, startled by it
A sudden cut to a bear’s paw reaching for the lunch, with a dramatic music chord
A bear quickly runs across the frame in the background, accompanied by a scare chord
Peter is suddenly grabbed from behind and pulled back with force
After a few seconds of drawn out tension, the bear finally lunges towards the park ranger in the foreground with a roar
Just when Sari finally decides to step out from behind the tree, the bear’s paw suddenly smashes into it
The bear’s paw breaks through the glass and grabs the teenager’s head
A bloodied hand suddenly smashes against the window in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
After a long buildup of tension, a broom falls across the doorframe in front of the medic, startling him
The bear barges through the door in front of the medic
A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash
Possessed Henrietta bursts through the cellar floor
Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door
Possessed Ash appears at a window
Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
A dog bark startles Jenny as she sunbathes
As a joke Steve scares Jenny in the tent
A car horn blares during a suspenseful scene
A creatures comes out of the orb and attacks his face
An axe goes through the door
A man hits the window of the door and begins yelling
Ass the light is turned on, Crawford charges forward with an axe
The fuse box catches fire
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
A bloodied woman suddenly appears at the window of a car
Marie closes a cabinet and in the reflection of the mirror Alex suddenly appears
As Alex lies sleeping a bloodied hand reaches out to touch her hair
Alex’s mother suddenly gasps as Marie reaches out to touch her
The gas station attendant gets a bottle of liquor out of a chiller. When he turns around the killer is standing right behind him
The killer comes up behind Marie and puts a bag over her head
The apparently dead killer suddenly grabs Marie around the throat
Alex looks at Marie through a one way mirror, suddenly Alex turns around and reaches for her
A man appears in front of the car and gets hit
For the next one-and-a-half-minutes there is a fast montage of flashy, sometimes scary looking images
The body-double suddenly opens his eyes
There is a sudden cut to a man shooting a vase
Sarah imagines her husband is still with her until she has a flashback of the car incident
Sarah is startled by a loud noise which triggers her to spot a silhouette in the window
The man is stabbed from behind by the strange woman
The officer screams at Sarah
Three syringes drop down from a chain in front of where Ryan is standing
A pitchfork lands near Mitch while he is trapped in the grain silo
At Eleanor’s storage unit – Halloran turns the light on and the shredded body of Mitch suddenly drops down in front of him
Back in his house – Logan turns around and sees Eleanor standing there watching him
As Anna attempts to escape, a figure wearing a pig mask appears and stabs her with a syringe
As Logan backs away from Eleanor he is suddenly grabbed by Halloran
An unseen person stabs Halloran with a syringe as he looks for Eleanor
The monster loudly slides the plate forward, disturbing the son’s thoughts
The monster’s hand grabs the son’s leg
The son, now with blood all over his face, lunges from the shadows towards the camera/mother
A sound effect plays as Jeremiah becomes agitated when asking Marlene to fetch Brother Swan
As the lights flicker, the Black Skulls suddenly grab Red and Mandy from their beds
Accompanied by a sound effect, Red looks in a bedroom to see a dead couple covered in blood
There is a loud gunshot and the television blows out
As Red tastes the contents of the jar, he violently hallucinates and some unsettling imagery flashes across the screen
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek
Madison suddenly gasps as she sees a dead body
A shadowy figure suddenly slams the front door shut as Madison is trying to escape
Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest

movies.title: Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight

jump_scares.spoiler: A postman gets grabbed by his feet and pulled inside a hole
A fox runs across the screen (accompanied by a loud sound)
Sudden cut to a monster standing above a character (accompanied by a loud sound)
Sudden cut to a rotten body (accompanied by a loud sound)
A severed head gets thrown out of the hole
A boy looks at his friend and sees her gruesomely killed
A priest turns around and sees a monster standing right next to him
Little boys turn their heads and look at their mom (accompanied by a loud sound)
A girl suddenly runs into a window of a police car
A bloodied and mutilated hand reaches up out of the water
The dock collapses causing Sheriff Forester to fall into the water
A mutilated dead body suddenly pops up out of the water onto Sheriff Forester’s back
A fish embryo inside an egg suddenly starts moving
A Piranha suddenly bites the diver’s hand
Piranhas suddenly appear, chasing a girl in the water
The girl who was parasailing is lifted out of the water revealing her missing legs and mutilated body
A girl being carried out of the water, suddenly splits in two
A giant piranha suddenly jumps out of the water and over the boat, taking Novak with it
A snowball hits the window
A blast of air comes from the fireplace
The hand of the corpse moves
A loud noise plays
The scene abruptly cuts to a man struggling in a cage trap
After Zepp’s eye is revealed in Daina’s closet, the closet doors slam open
A masked man lunges at Dr. Gordon while he is on phone
A toy begins making laughing noises behind Adam
Adam’s camera flashes to reveal a masked man hiding in a cupboard
Dr. Gordon is electrocuted while he is sobbing on the floor
A person wearing a pig mask attacks Agent Strahm
Detective Hoffman opens a door and a barking dog lunges at him from the other side
There is a loud bang on Paul’s car
Paul turns around and is stabbed by a person wearing a pig mask
Brit startles Ercikson
Jonas removes a sheet covering a dead person
Obi puts his hand up to the glass window of the oven as he burns alive
Obi’s hand reaches through the broken oven window
Amanda turns around and bumps into Jonas
A masked figure in the bath tub jumps up and stabs Eric with a syringe. [Video]
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass
The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home

movies.title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw

jump_scares.spoiler: The camera cuts back from the mannequin to the cop to reveal a man in a pig mask who suddenly attacks him
Fitch quickly removes the cloak to reveal a pig mask underneath
As Fitch is walking away, he is jumped by the man in the pig mask
After showing the spiral for a few seconds, there is a loud glitch sound and the video cuts away to a pig doll
Zeke opens the car door and a dead pig falls out, startling him
The camera pans around the room to reveal the man in the pig mask in front of Angie
There is a sudden loud cut from Zeke sitting in his car to him screaming
As Zeke walks out the door, he is attacked by the man in the pig mask
Marcus turns back around and is jumped by the man in the pig mask
Some viewers might be startled at two stabbings at this point
Woman says “talk to me” and turns to see a man in front of her
Woman says “talk to me” again and a woman appears in front of her
Woman barks like a dog suddenly
Man says “I let you in” and head tilts backwards
Boy bites girl in the hand
Some viewers might be startled at man lunging at woman
The disfigured woman suddenly attacks the TV host
Tara backs into a woman standing behind her
After standing motionless for several seconds, the clown suddenly runs after Tara
Accompanied by a sound effect, the clown suddenly looks towards where Tara is hiding
The clown stabs Tara in the leg
After Tara yells “Mister!”, the clown grabs her from behind
The clown lifts the hammer and lunges at Tara causing her to flinch
The clown again lunges at Tara with the hammer
The pest exterminator turns around and almost walks into a woman standing behind him
The clown (disguised as Tara), suddenly sits up behind Vicky
The clown appears in front of the peep hole that Vicky is looking through
During a tense scene, a mop falls out of a bucket creating a loud noise
The clown suddenly places some plastic wrap over Vicky’s face
There is a sudden cut to Tara’s mutilated corpse
The clown appears through a door and attacks the pest exterminator
The clown reaches through a gap in the doors to grab Vicky
There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker
The clown grabs the coroner by the neck
The sudden click and flash of a camera during a quiet scene may startle some viewers
There is an abrupt scene change to the autopsy room where loud music is playing
A girl jumps on Austin from behind (as a joke)
Tommy rings the bell on the corpse’s foot to scare Emma
Something moves inside the ventilation duct causing Austin to fall backwards
Austin looks underneath the door and sees a foot come into view
There is a loud bang on the door
Something pulls Tommy away and the door slams shut
Austin looks through the hole in the door and sees a decomposed face with eyes and mouth stitched shut
Tommy looks around and sees a face come out of the fog at him
There is another loud bang on the door
Austin turns around and Tommy is standing directly behind him
An old woman appears from under the sheets
A man jumps out from behind a wall
Dark arms protrude from the mirror
A bang comes from the wardrobe
Tommy suddenly combusts
Possessed Lane shakes and makes a loud noise
A second bang comes from the wardrobe
A rat jumps out from behind a box
Possessed Lane turns and looks at Max
A hand touches Max’s shoulder
A demon grabs  Chris’s leg from under the toilet stall
A demon jumps towards the camera
A third bang comes from the wardrobe
Possessed Lane suddenly looks up
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
A reporter walks down a dark hallway and is hit by a stick held by someone off-screen
Alison lifts up a can of bug spray to reveal Dale standing behind it watching her
Chloe puts her hand on Alison’s shoulder
An unseen person appears in camera shot, ambushing the woman hiding behind the tree trunk
Chad taps on the car door and yells out (as a joke) which startles Alison
Chloe jumps out in front of the cop car
There are several loud gunshots
Chad ambushes Tucker who is attempting to hide behind a tree trunk
Dale looks up and sees Mitch impaled on the tree
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
A snake snaps at Darius as he reaches into the hole
Darius is grabbed from above
Two masked members appear in the shadows
Jen is grabbed by Darius
Jen is rushed by Edith
Jen is attacked
A cult member charges out of the cave
An axe lands between Jen and Scott
(-1:11:10) A quiet scene suddenly cuts to a loud ventilator
(-1:05:14) A hand suddenly comes out of the hole in the decapitated head
(-45:04) As Will opens the cupboard a cockroach flies out
(-44:02)  The man at the table suddenly spits out blood
(-33:45) The creature jumps at the camera
(-30:49) As Will enters the bedroom he sees a mask accompanied by a sound effect
